entries.femaleVariant: Worry not, unwashed masses! Our wondrous lives in Night City won't change much – but when do they ever?
Let's get outta here.
Heh, look at the city. Somewhere in there those bastards from Arasaka are wondering how they lost everything.
They'll never find us.
Nothing left for me here.
Used to think of it as my city. Bonded together – I owned it, it owned me... Nothing to keep me there now, though.
It's nothing.
Glad we wound up here together.
Can't be certain I'd have left if not for you.
Panam, after Mikoshi, everything there... I'm glad we made it... here... together.
Gotta say, I didn't expect things to end this way.
entries.maleVariant: Gotta say, didn't expect things to end this way.

entries.femaleVariant: What I'm looking for, it's just not there.
I'll take care of this, figure it out, you'll see.
What's our plan? Everything set?
Just a little blood, Panam. It's nothin'.
Gonna figure this out, Panam.
Don't worry about it, I'm fine. What's the plan?
It's just not there, what I'm lookin' for.
And if I changed my mind? Would you stay with me?
This dam… remember it well. Our beginnings.
Why'd you wanna meet here? For the view, or you turnin' sentimental on me?
I did not know what to make of you then.
Now you do know?
What'd you think?
And now you do?
What did you think of me?
entries.maleVariant: What did you make of me?

entries.femaleVariant: You'll not get any tearful confessions out of me.
I wondered if you were anything like me. Carrying within you something damn important to prove to yourself.
I was. We both were. Bet you had no idea we'd end up like this, though.
So you do remember.
I thought of it then as a one-time thing. I would help you, you would help--
Mhm. Had it in for the Raffens. You were out to get 'em with Mitch's and Scorpion's help.
Should've done this long ago – gotten some perspective... on the city, my life there.
The city of dreams. I'd gladly kick the balls off the idiot who thought that one up.
Uh-huh, Night City. Did you think you would stay forever?
Mhm. Couple of months ago, no way I'd've said I'd leave NC. Woulda staked my life on it.
Not sure I'da found the courage without you. Thanks.
Bid the city farewell. We won't see it again.
Would you stay with me? If I changed my mind, didn't wanna leave?
They're my family, V. I can't abandon them. I wouldn't want to. And I'm glad I won't have to choose.
You're coming with us. And then… we will see.
"Then." Maybe we oughta try not livin' for "thens" anymore.
I feel the same way. What on earth was I thinking?
Thought the city would help us see ourselves for who we were. Both of us.
Yes! But damn it, it's like a damned dealer at a damned Kabuki casino. And I went all in, and I lost everything.
Almost everything.
Yes, I suppose you're right. We owe that shithole something.
But we're getting out. At last. Placing our bets on something better, somewhere else.
Do you think we'll ever find it?
Doubt it. But maybe that's not so bad.
Shit, V. You're bleeding again.
V, promise me. As soon as we arrive down south, we'll go to my contacts. We'll fix… whatever needs fixing.
Let's get outta here.
What about our plan – everything set?
Vik's drug helps a bit now.
They've pulled some of our folks out of deep, deep cesspits. They'll help, you'll see.
And once we get to where we're goin', we'll try all your contacts.
Good to hear, it really is.
Everything is set. We'll meet our people soon, gather our gear and set off.
Speaking of which, what about our plan?
Lost everything to that city. Time to take something back.
Quicker I forget the whole damn thing, the better.
This city makes false promises, many of them grand, doesn't it?
Yeah. See through 'em before you lose everything then you're pretty damn lucky.
entries.maleVariant: Mhm. If you see through them before you lose everything, then you're pretty damn lucky.

entries.femaleVariant: Perhaps luck's with us, now. Perhaps we're leaving just in time.
Think it is. Think we are. Time to make up for things.
Everything is set and confirmed. We'll meet our people soon, gather our gear and set off.
Good news is, somethin' like a sandstorm this way comes from the south. Weather guy says it stands to be the biggest in years. Should be a sight to behold.
It wouldn't be tearful. I know you.
entries.maleVariant: Eh, it wouldn't be tearful. I know you.

entries.femaleVariant: What I think of you now matters not at all.
Tomorrow we will be elsewhere. We'll start everything anew, you and I. Ask me then.
Can't hardly wait. Get ready, Arizona, here we come!
A wager I'd have lost if I'd taken it.
And that we're leavin'... together.
Oh, stop… And you'd best say your goodbye to this view. You won't see the city again.
If Night City taught me anything, it's to beware of your dreams. 'Cause somehow they always find a way to come back and bite you in the ass.
Yes, the road could be hard. But as long as we don't fuck up, we should cross the border in a matter of hours.
Fuck. No, no, that's a lie.
If they'd agreed, you'd've told me to fuck off then and there.
Yes, the road could be hard. But as long as we don't fuck up, we should cross the border in a matter of hours.
Do you mean Mikoshi?
We live 'midst dust and chrome, and 'midst dust and chrome we shall all die. Now for some good news and some bad news.
Bad news? Damn storm won't reach Night City. So seems we'll all live to see another day after all. Drat.
Won't lose me. I promise.
Don't worry about a thing. Let’s ride.
Won't lose me, Panam. I promise. Bet you'll have enough of me yet.
Saul, once... do you know what he told me?
That anyone is truly free just once – when they know they have nothing to lose.
Exactly. Next months – that's us. Got nothin' to lose and that's how we live.
Don't worry about a thing.
[Lean] I remember this place.
Sure. But, V?
Get a good look at the city, one last time. If you need to, I mean. I'll wait in the car.
Well, Night City – good night and good luck.
[Step away] Later, Night City.
Yet here we are, on the road…
[Get out]
Doe'n't matter, don't think. We'll forget it all tanning our backsides in the Arizona sun.
Heh, truer words I've never heard... Night City chewed us up good, didn't it?
Time and perspective – need a bit of both.
Oh, stop.
They'll figure it out one day. But we'll be long gone.
They'll never find us. Can promise you that.
I know. Perhaps that's why I need a good long look. One day, this view will be a happy memory.
About to turn on your heel, never see the city again. I think that makes you happy right now.
entries.maleVariant: About to turn on your heel, never to see the city again. I think that makes you happy right now.

entries.femaleVariant: And you? Ready? Do you feel the road beckoning? It's possibly your last glance at those buildings.
I promise.
Let's get going.
I solemnly swear. We make a run for Arizona, set up there, then scour the land for a fix for my head.
C'mon, got a border to cross. Shouldn't waste any more time.
Simple enough? I'd say so.
It's a good plan, V... Hmm, do you know what Saul once told me?
Up in smoke, with damage valued in excess of the annual budget of many a small country. Serves you right, 'Saka! How's it feel to be on your knees, huh? Hihi!
[Get in]
